tools.name: consume_connection
tools.code:
from promptflow.tools.aoai import AzureOpenAI
from promptflow.connections import AzureOpenAIConnection, BingConnection, CustomConnection
from typing import List, Mapping, Dict
from promptflow import tool
@tool
def consume_connection(
    conn: CustomConnection,
    question: str,
    aoai: AzureOpenAIConnection,
    bing: BingConnection,
):
    assert isinstance(conn, CustomConnection)
    assert isinstance(aoai, AzureOpenAIConnection)
    assert isinstance(bing, BingConnection)
    return AzureOpenAI(aoai).completion(question, "text-ada-001")
